statements: DELETE FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;
DELETE FROM ClimateData WHERE id = 1 AND temperature > 25.0
DELETE FROM AgroforestryClimateData WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'Forest A';
DELETE FROM AgroforestryPractices WHERE implemented_by = 'Farmer John' AND practice_name = 'Agroforestry';
DELETE FROM climate_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND temperature > 30
DELETE FROM agroforestry_practices WHERE crop_name = 'Apple' OR soil_type = 'Clay' AND area > 10
DELETE FROM climate_data WHERE temperature < 10 AND rainfall > 50;
DELETE FROM analysis_results WHERE conclusion LIKE '%inefficient%' AND date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Agroforestry_Practices WHERE tree_species = 'Oak' AND planting_date < '2022-01-01';
